title: Rasmataz Tandoori Restaurant
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Has had the same chef/owner for 20 years. The menu has many vegan choices, and the chef, who comes to your table for special requests, will make sure the food is perfect.  The portions are large, prices very reasonable. Located down the road between the 2 malls in Rodney Bay toward the marina. Meal ends with warm towels.
streetAddress: Rodney Bay Strip, Gros Islet, Opposite Royal St Lucian Hotel
